short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Deletes any wikipedia header as well as any block of text that contain the word 'fascism' or 'fascist'

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Whenever you load a Wikipedia page, if either the header of the page or a block of text mentions the word "fascism" or "fascist", the entire header or block of text will be completely removed. The point of this is to remind ourselves what happens when we sanitize and remove vital history.
